# Pushing and pulling your project

.pull-left[
* Think of it like hitting "Save".
* "Pull" downloads updates from GitHub
* "Commit" accrues local changes
* "Push" sends updates to GitHub
]

<img src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0nqJKEh3YCc/maxresdefault.jpg" width=400>
